question:
Given a jar file packaged with three web fragments with names X, Y and Z respectively.
Which of the following deployment descriptor, web.xml, snippets correspond to the web fragment processing orders of X, Y, Z?

(i) <absolute-ordering>
      <name>X</name>
      <name>Y</name>
      <name>Z</name>
    </absolute-ordering>
(ii) <absolute-ordering>
      <name>X</name>
      <name>Y</name>
     </absolute-ordering>
(iii) <absolute-ordering>
        </others>
        <name>Y</name>
        <name>Z</name>
      </absolute-ordering>
(iv) <absolute-ordering>
      <name>X</name>
      </others>
      <name>Z</name>
     </absolute-ordering>
(v) <absolute-ordering>
      <name>X</name>
      <name>Y</name>
      </others>
    </absolute-ordering>
